Package zork

Class FeatureEnergyTest

java.lang.Object
zork.FeatureEnergyTest
public class FeatureEnergyTest extends Object
Class to test the games and players energy processes and management

    Method
    Description
    void
    testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyHard()
    Assert that enemies energy will doubled when hard mode is chosen
    void
    testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyMedium()
    Assert that enemies energy will be increased by the half when medium mode is chosen
    void
    testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyEasy()
    Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 15 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (20 for easy mode)
    void
    testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyHard()
    Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 5 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (60 for hard mode)
    void
    testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyMedium()
    Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 10 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (40 for medium mode)
    void
    testNoEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyEasy()
    Assert that enemies energy will not be increased when easy mode is chosen
    void
    testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstBeneathLowerLimit()
    Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will not be increased when hunger and thirst are beneath lower limit for fill-up (20 for example in easy mode)
    void
    testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerOrThirstBeneathLowerLimit()
    Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will not be increased when hunger or thirst are beneath lower limit for fill-up (20 for example in easy mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthReduced()
    Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 5 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for easy mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthUnchanged()
    Assert that through action hunger (that is consuming energy) is reduced by 3, thirst reduced by 2 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for easy mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthReduced()
    Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 15 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for hard mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthUnchanged()
    Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) hunger is reduced by 9, thirst reduced by 6 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for hard mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthReduced()
    Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 10 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for medium mode)
    void
    testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthUnchanged()
    Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) hunger is reduced by 6, thirst reduced by 4 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for medium mode)

  • Method Details

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthUnchanged

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players energy levels are reduced, health unchanged, difficulty easy") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthUnchanged()
      Assert that through action hunger (that is consuming energy) is reduced by 3, thirst reduced by 2 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for easy mode)

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthUnchanged

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players energy levels are reduced, health unchanged, difficulty medium") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthUnchanged()
      Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) hunger is reduced by 6, thirst reduced by 4 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for medium mode)

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthUnchanged

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players energy levels are reduced, health unchanged, difficulty hard") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthUnchanged()
      Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) hunger is reduced by 9, thirst reduced by 6 and health remains unchanged when hunger and thirst are not at 0 (for hard mode)

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthReduced

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be reduced if hunger+thirst are at 0, difficulty easy") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyEasy_HealthReduced()
      Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 5 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for easy mode)

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthReduced

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be reduced if hunger+thirst are at 0, difficulty medium") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyMedium_HealthReduced()
      Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 10 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for medium mode)

    • testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthReduced

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be reduced if hunger+thirst are at 0, difficulty hard") public void testReducingPlayersEnergyWhilePlaying_DifficultyHard_HealthReduced()
      Assert that through action (that is consuming energy) health will be reduced by 15 when hunger and thirst are at 0 (for hard mode)

    • testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyEasy

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be increased if hunger+thirst are above 20, difficulty easy") public void testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyEasy()
      Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 15 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (20 for easy mode)

    • testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyMedium

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be increased if hunger+thirst are above 40, difficulty medium") public void testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyMedium()
      Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 10 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (40 for medium mode)

    • testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyHard

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be increased if hunger+thirst are above 60, difficulty hard") public void testIncreasingPlayersHealthWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstAboveLowerLimit_DifficultyHard()
      Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will be increased by 5 when hunger and thirst are above lower limit for fill-up (60 for hard mode)

    • testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstBeneathLowerLimit

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be increased if hunger+thirst are beneath 20, difficulty easy") public void testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerAndThirstBeneathLowerLimit()
      Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will not be increased when hunger and thirst are beneath lower limit for fill-up (20 for example in easy mode)

    • testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerOrThirstBeneathLowerLimit

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if players health level will be increased if hunger or thirst are beneath 20, difficulty easy") public void testNoHealthIncreasingWhilePlaying_HungerOrThirstBeneathLowerLimit()
      Assert that through action (that is not consuming energy) health will not be increased when hunger or thirst are beneath lower limit for fill-up (20 for example in easy mode)

    • testNoEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyEasy

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if enemies level will not be increased if difficulty easy is chosen") public void testNoEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyEasy()
      Assert that enemies energy will not be increased when easy mode is chosen

    • testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyMedium

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if enemies level will be increased by the half if difficulty medium is chosen") public void testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyMedium()
      Assert that enemies energy will be increased by the half when medium mode is chosen

    • testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyHard

      @Test @DisplayName("Test if enemies level will be doubled if difficulty hard is chosen") public void testEnergyIncreasingForEnemies_DifficultyHard()
      Assert that enemies energy will doubled when hard mode is chosen
